messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] unschooling food
messages.msgSnippet: ... This has been my experience.  The more candy, cookies, etc. I keep around, the less I want to eat them.  At one point we had an entire cupboard of
messages.messageBody:
1/14/03 17:47:

> And REALLY---if you have a HUGE bowl there all the time (must be constantly
> refilled and never empty) you'll be SO surprised at how little you'll
> EVENTUALLY eat. But just like the kids, don't expect it to happen all at
> once!

This has been my experience. The more candy, cookies, etc. I keep around,
the less I want to eat them. At one point we had an entire cupboard of
chocolate candy. I wanted salmon and asparagus so bad, then! Chocolate?
Blah!

brenda
